original_text: When the Jewish leaders heard this, they put their hands over their ears. Then they shouted very loudly at Stephen and they all ran towards him.
korean_text: 그들이 큰 소리를 지르며 귀를 막고 일제히 그에게 달려들어

sentences.original_text: When the Jewish leaders heard this
they put their hands over their ears
Then they shouted very loudly at Stephen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 스테반에게 매우 큰 소리로 외쳤다

sentences.original_text: and they all ran towards him
